attributes.action: Allow all schools to top up the National Education Grant, thus allowing a fair selection across state and private nursery institutions
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: A condition of the National Education Grant (NEG) is that a school/nursery is not allowed to charge a top up fee if it accepts children using the NEG. As the fee is currently so low (£3.10 per child) this does not provide sufficient funds for all private institutions to run an effective service. By allowing a top up fee, parents have a choice (the point of the NEG) and nurseries can provide the best possible service they can.
